# Problem 11.25 - By Superposition {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

An overhanging beam is loaded as shown where L = 7.5 m and w = 7.5 kN/m. Determine the magnitude of the deflection at point A. Assume EI = 30,000 kN-m<sup>2</sup>.
